title: Bang Bang Burgers and Beer
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Club/restaurant/bar specializing in burgers, fries and beer. Menu has one designated veggie burger, but apart from that, all burgers can be ordered 100% vegan with a meat free burger patty from Fry's Family Foods or an in-house-made  vegetable patty. Menu also clearly labels vegan drink choices.
